text: jyare musa (a.Sa.) E potani kaumane kahyum he mari kauma! Vacharadane pujya banavi tame potana jivo para atyacara karyo che, have tame potana sarjanahara tarapha pacha pharo, potane andara andara katla karo, allahani najika a manja tamari uttamata che, to tene (allaha) tamari tauba kabula kari, te tauba kabula karanara ane daya karanara che
